title: Hokuryo
marks:
Signature, Title, Marks, Inscription, and Label
 LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in grey: [Hokuryo]; L
description: orange two-tone building with three archways and three stone staircases with lions; ornate decoration at roof; groups of people standing about
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
